item.title: 银行收紧贷款，垃圾债券大师认为未来困境将加剧
item.description: 资深高收益分析师马蒂-弗里德森（Marty Fridson）认为，强劲的美国经济使不良债务投资者缺乏机会，但这种情况可能即将改变。【原文：The strong US economy has left distressed debt investors starved of opportunity but that may be about to change, according to veteran high-yield analyst Marty Fridson.】

item.title: 肖尔茨表示欧盟将反击特朗普关税，但最好能达成协议
item.description: 德国总理奥拉夫-肖尔茨（Olaf Scholz）表示，欧盟有足够的实力应对美国的任何关税威胁，但他希望通过谈判达成协议，避免贸易战。【原文：German Chancellor Olaf Scholz said the European Union is strong enough to counter any US tariff threats but that he hopes for a negotiated agreement that can avoid a trade war.】

item.title: 德国默茨表示对欧盟共同国防借款持开放态度
item.description: 德国下一任总理的热门人选弗里德里希-梅尔茨（Friedrich Merz）表示，他对考虑欧盟共同借贷国防资金持开放态度。【原文：Friedrich Merz, the frontrunner to be Germany’s next chancellor, said he’s open to considering common European Union borrowing for defense, a potential game-changer as the bloc responds to Russian aggression and fading US engagement.】

item.title: 苹果公司旨在通过人工智能功能和空间内容应用程序提升 Vision Pro 的性能
item.description: 苹果公司正计划为其 Vision Pro 头戴式耳机添加苹果智能，同时更新访客用户模式和空间内容应用程序，以提高人们对该设备的兴趣。【原文：Apple Inc. is planning to add Apple Intelligence to its Vision Pro headset, along with an updated mode for guest users and a spatial content app, as it seeks to boost interest in the device.】

item.title: 马斯克的能源部开始解雇联邦 IT 部门的员工
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的数字服务办公室（DOGE）团队正在向美国数字服务办公室（US Digital Services Office）的员工发送解雇通知。【原文：Elon Musk’s DOGE team is sending termination notices to staffers at the US Digital Services Office, a group of federal IT workers that Musk’s group is taking over, according to two people who were affected.】

item.title: 意大利邮政获政府批准收购意大利电信股份
item.description: 意大利国营邮政服务公司收购了意大利电信公司（Telecom Italia SpA）的股份，这是政府为在电信业重新打造 "国家冠军 "而采取的一项举措。【原文：Italy’s state-run postal service bought a stake in Telecom Italia SpA amid a government push to recreate a “national champion” in the telecommunications industry.】

item.title: 非洲首富计划斥资 4 亿美元扩建埃塞俄比亚水泥厂
item.description: 非洲首富阿里科-丹格特（Aliko Dangote）宣布了一项耗资 4 亿美元的计划，以恢复埃塞俄比亚穆盖尔水泥厂的第二条生产线，目的是将该厂的年产量翻一番，达到 500 万吨。【原文：Aliko Dangote, Africa’s richest man, announced a $400 million plan to revive a second production line at the Mugher cement plant in Ethiopia, aiming to double the facility’s annual capacity to 5 million tons.】

item.title: 2024 年秘鲁经济增长 3.3%，巩固衰退复苏势头
item.description: 秘鲁经济在经历了一年前的衰退后，于 2024 年强劲反弹，巩固了政府对经济强劲复苏的承诺。【原文：Peru’s economy bounced back strongly in 2024 after a recession a year earlier, cementing the government’s promises of a robust recovery.】

item.title: 马斯克的 DOGE 公司与美国国家航空航天局（NASA）在对特朗普忠实拥护者的棘手考验中发生碰撞
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的国家航空和宇宙航行局（DOGE）员工本周抵达美国国家航空航天局（NASA）后，立即对劳动力数据进行了分析，据一位航天局高级官员称，他们承诺将对支出和合同进行深入审计。【原文：Elon Musk’s DOGE staff wasted no time since arriving at NASA this week, analyzing workforce data and, according to a top space agency official, pledging a deep-dive audit of spending and contracts.】

item.title: 波兰称欧洲领导人将举行紧急乌克兰会谈
item.description: 据波兰外长称，欧洲领导人将于周一在巴黎就乌克兰和欧洲大陆更广泛的安全问题举行紧急会谈，各国首都正竭力劝说唐纳德-特朗普不要匆忙与俄罗斯进行和平谈判。【原文：European leaders are set to meet in Paris Monday for urgent talks on Ukraine and the continent’s wider security, according to Poland’s foreign minister, as capitals desperately try to persuade Donald Trump not to rush into peace negotiations with Russia.】

item.title: 欧盟正在商谈为修复受损海底电缆的船队提供资金
item.description: 欧盟技术负责人表示，欧盟正在酝酿一项价值 "数亿 "欧元的公私合作计划，以购买能够在海底电缆遭到损坏或破坏时及时修复的船只。【原文：The European Union is mulling a public-private initiative worth “hundreds of millions” of euros to buy ships that can promptly repair subsea cables in case of damage or sabotage, the bloc’s tech chief said.】

item.title: 从纽约市到多伦多，混乱的冬季风暴将带来降雪和降雨
item.description: 纽约和美国东北部地区将在周六夜间迎来一场冬季暴风雪，这场暴风雪还将覆盖中西部和安大略省南部地区，降雪量将达到几英寸。【原文：New York and the US Northeast will pick up a few inches of snow overnight on Saturday from a winter storm that will also blanket the Midwest and southern Ontario.】

item.title: 非洲集团在改革呼声中推选尤素福为新领导人
item.description: 非洲联盟选举吉布提外交部长马哈茂德-阿里-优素福（Mahamoud Ali Youssouf）为其执行机构负责人，外界呼吁对该集团进行重大调整，以帮助非洲大陆更加自力更生。【原文：The African Union elected Djiboutian Foreign Affairs Minister Mahamoud Ali Youssouf as the head of its executive arm amid calls for a major shake up of the bloc to help make the continent more self-reliant.】

item.title: 伊拉克在损失 190 亿美元后努力恢复对土耳其的石油输送
item.description: 伊拉克外长表示，伊拉克正在努力与半自治的库尔德斯坦地区政府解决技术问题，以重启一条通往土耳其的原油出口管道，此前这条管道已关闭近两年，伊拉克因此损失了约 190 亿美元的收入。【原文：Iraq is working to iron out technical issues with the semi-autonomous Kurdistan Regional Government to restart a crude export pipeline to Turkey after an almost two-year shutdown that cost Iraq around $19 billion in lost revenue, its foreign minister said.】

item.title: 美国企业盈利前景黯淡为股市反弹蒙上阴影
item.description: 在稳健的第四季度财报季背后，有一个令人担忧的事态发展可能会削弱美股的牛市行情：美国企业的盈利前景正在恶化。【原文：Beneath a solid fourth-quarter earnings season, there’s a worrisome development that may put a dent in the bull case for US stocks: Corporate America’s profit outlook is souring.】

item.title: 休斯顿最古老的炼油厂即将关闭。它不会是最后一家。
item.description: 经过一个多世纪在休斯顿航道沿岸的燃料生产后，这座休斯顿最古老的炼油厂正准备关闭，可能导致数百人失业。该炼油厂的竞争对手对它的倒闭表示欢迎。【原文：After more than a century of churning out fuel on the banks of the Houston Ship Channel, the city’s oldest refinery is preparing to shut down, potentially putting hundreds of people out of work. Its competitors are welcoming its demise.】

item.title: 英国《金融时报》称，Netflix 拼图提供商 Keesing 将被出售
item.description: 据《金融时报》报道，荷兰益智媒体公司 Keesing Media Group BV 正准备由其私募股权所有者 BC Partners 出售。【原文：Keesing Media Group BV, a Dutch puzzle media company, is being prepared for sale by its private equity owner, BC Partners, according to the Financial Times.】

item.title: 华尔街周押注市场
item.description:
为什么最近预测市场受到如此关注？【原文：

Why prediction markets are getting so much attention these days.

】

item.title: 在特朗普对欧洲的贸易战中，中国赢了
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普在 10 月份接受彭博新闻社主编约翰-米克尔斯韦特（John Micklethwait）采访时被问及，如果华盛顿加强对欧洲的贸易保护，那么美国对中国的地缘政治地位就有可能受到损害。【原文：Donald Trump, in an October interview with Bloomberg News Editor-in-Chief John Micklethwait, was asked about the risk of undermining America’s geopolitical position vis-à-vis China if Washington ramped up trade protections against Europe.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长帕内塔称无需暂缓降息
item.description: 欧洲央行理事会成员法比奥-帕内塔（Fabio Panetta）表示，由于2%的物价目标已近在眼前，且通胀风险偏向下行，因此没有必要暂缓降息。【原文：There’s no need to hold back on European Central Bank interest rate cuts as the 2% price target is in sight and inflation risks are to the downside, Governing Council member Fabio Panetta said.】

item.title: 全球经济图表：美国通胀率在关税前回升
item.description: 今年年初，美国通胀率普遍回升，进一步降低了美联储很快降息的可能性。【原文：US inflation picked up broadly at the start of the year, further diminishing chances the Federal Reserve will cut interest rates anytime soon.】

item.title: 帕内塔称 M&A 将为贷款人提供规模：意大利银行最新消息
item.description: 意大利的银行家们正在都灵举行的年度Assiom外汇会议上讨论他们行业的未来，该行业受到了整合浪潮的冲击，因为贷款人正在寻求调配过剩资本，并在利率准备下降的情况下实现收入多样化。【原文：Bankers in Italy are meeting at the annual Assiom Forex conference in Turin to discuss the future of their industry, which has been hit by a wave of consolidation, as lenders are seeking to deploy excess capital and diversify revenue with interest rates poised to fall.】

item.title: 肖尔茨给德国人留下了一代人中最糟糕的经济忧郁症
item.description: 奥拉夫-肖尔茨正在走向德国历任总理中最惨痛的选举失败，而他糟糕的经济记录是一个重要原因。【原文：Olaf Scholz is heading for the worst election defeat of any German chancellor, and his poor economic track record is one major reason.】

item.title: 财富基金主管称，对风险的厌恶阻碍了英国的发展
item.description: 英国在风险方面存在问题；国家承担的风险不足。【原文：Britain has a problem with risk — the country does not take enough of it.】

item.title: 加纳总统称美国冻结援助使其软实力受损
item.description: 加纳总统约翰-马哈马说，美国冻结国际援助的决定很可能会给世界最大经济体带来 "反作用"。【原文：The US’s decision to freeze international aid will likely cause “blowback” for the world’s largest economy, Ghana’s President John Mahama said.】

item.title: 美国寻求通过交易拥有乌克兰 50%的稀土矿产：美国全国广播公司（NBC
item.description: 据美国全国广播公司（NBC）报道，作为两国伙伴关系协议的一部分，美国正在向乌克兰总统沃洛德梅尔-泽连斯基（Volodymyr Zelenskiy）提交一份提案，寻求拥有乌克兰 50%的稀土矿。【原文：The US is seeking to own 50% of Ukraine’s rare earth minerals in a proposal presented to President Volodymyr Zelenskiy as part of a partnership accord between the two countries, NBC reported.】

item.title: 米莱推加密代币，后因担心受骗删帖
item.description: 哈维尔-米莱伊总统为一种旨在帮助阿根廷当地企业的加密代币做了广告，但他的支持引起了人们对潜在骗局的广泛担忧，于是他删除了帖子。【原文：President Javier Milei advertised a crypto token meant to help local Argentine businesses, but his support was met with widespread concern about a potential scam and he deleted the post.】

item.title: Spotify 考虑收取 6 美元的高级会员费以增加功能和获取门票
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士称，Spotify Technology SA 正寻求在现有订购服务的基础上，为一项新的超级粉丝流媒体服务收取高达 5.99 美元的月费，该服务将包括更高质量的音频、混音工具和音乐会门票。【原文：Spotify Technology SA is looking to charge as much as $5.99 a month on top of existing subscriptions for a new super-fan streaming service that will include higher-quality audio, remixing tools and access to concert tickets, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 飓风减弱后澳大利亚铁矿石出口枢纽将重新开放
item.description: 澳大利亚最大的铁矿石港口预计将在周六晚些时候重新开放，因为它没有受到强烈热带气旋 "泽利亚 "的严重破坏。【原文：Australia’s biggest iron ore port is expected to reopen later Saturday after being spared any major damage from Severe Tropical Cyclone Zelia.】

item.title: 鲁比奥与菲律宾总统马纳洛讨论南海协调问题
item.description: 据美国国务院称，美国国务卿马尔科-鲁比奥（Marco Rubio）和菲律宾国务卿恩里克-马纳洛（Enrique Manalo）周五在慕尼黑举行的会晤中讨论了 "协调应对中国在南中国海破坏稳定的行动 "和加强经济合作的问题。【原文：US Secretary of State Marco Rubio and his Philippine counterpart, Enrique Manalo, discussed “coordination on addressing China’s destabilizing actions in the South China Sea” and increased economic cooperation in a meeting in Munich on Friday, according to the US State Department.】
